item.title: Github Pages, GitHub Actions, and Hugo
item.description: For the last few years I’ve had my personal website hosted via GitHub Pages. To make my life even easier I’ve always used a static site generator; first I used Pelican and most recently had it set up with Nikola - both were great. Nikola is especially nice as it made deploying Jupyter notebooks as blog posts incredibly easy. Recently I’ve wanted to mess with the style of my site a bit more.
